text: Envia is a spider genus in the family Microstigmatidae, found only in Brazil. ==Species== , the World Spider Catalog accepted the following species: *Envia garciai Ott & Höfer, 2003 (type species) – Brazil *Envia moleque Miglio & Bonaldo, 2011 – Brazil ==References== Category:Spiders of Brazil Category:Mygalomorphae genera
title: Envia
